newsitem.title: FINLAND: METRA SAYS WARTSILA WINS FIM 68 MLN ORDER.
newsitem.headline: METRA SAYS WARTSILA WINS FIM 68 MLN ORDER.

text.p: Diversified engineering group Oy Metra Ab said in a statement on Wednesday its Wartsila Diesel division will deliver a 13 megawatt diesel power plant to Nepal in a deal worth 68 million markka.

The power plant will be delivered to Nepal's electricity company NEA. The new plant will expand output at NEA's facility in Biratnagar, which after the expansion will account for 15 percent of electricity output capacity, Metra said.
